title: Available 9/1/2022 3 Bed in Private Home
posting_body: ['Spacious 3-bedroom, 2 level freshly painted apartment with eat-in kitchen and new stove, living room, bathroom with new vanity and office space all located in a three-family private home in a quiet, residential Boston neighborhood.', ' Backyard and farmer’s porch for sitting and relaxing after a long day.', 'Come see this oasis in the city before it is gone!', 'A commuter’s dream location!', 'Restaurants, shopping and entertainment are within walking distance.', 'Transportation from Boston Landing train station, Greenline (Boston College to Government Center) and various buses (Watertown, Kenmore, Brookline, Cambridge, Harvard Square and Central Square Cambridge).', ' Close to hospitals (St. Elizabeths, Franciscan, Mt. Auburn, Beth Israel, Dana Farber, Brigham and Womens and Mass General).', ' Close to universities and colleges (Boston College, Boston University, Harvard and Radcliffe).', 'Supermarkets and convenience stores (Stop & Shop, Star Market and 7-Eleven) are also very close by.', 'Highway to Mass Pike and Storrow Drive short drive.', 'Available 9/1/2022', 'Rent $2,800 per month.', 'Utilities not included.', 'CALL OR TEXT Athena, owner at 857-540-6249 to set up an appointment to view this great apartment!', 'First and Security Deposit.', 'NO FEE', 'No pets', 'No Smoking']
